title: Giro d’Italia Confirms 2025 ‘Big Start’ in Albania with 3 Stages
content:
Two road stages and a time trial will open the 108th edition of the 'corsa rosa.' The remainder of the season's first grand tour will be disclosed by next month.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Confirms 2025 ‘Big Start’ in Albania with 3 Stages on Velo.
author: ahood
